org.nd4j.aeron.ipc

Interface NDArrayHolder

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    InMemoryNDArrayHolder

    public interface NDArrayHolder
extends java.io.Serializable
    A simple interface for retrieving an ndarray

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      INDArray get()
      Retrieve an ndarray
      INDArray getTad(int idx, int... dimensions)
      Retrieve a partial view of the ndarray.
      void setArray(INDArray arr)
      Set the ndarray
      int totalUpdates()
      The number of updates that have been sent to this older.

    • Method Detail

      • setArray

        void setArray(INDArray arr)
        Set the ndarray
        Parameters:
        arr - the ndarray for this holder to use

      • totalUpdates

        int totalUpdates()
        The number of updates that have been sent to this older.
        Returns:

      • get

        INDArray get()
        Retrieve an ndarray
        Returns:

      • getTad

        INDArray getTad(int idx,
                int... dimensions)
        Retrieve a partial view of the ndarray. This method uses tensor along dimension internally Note this will call dup()
        Parameters:
        idx - the index of the tad to get
        dimensions - the dimensions to use
        Returns:
        the tensor along dimension based on the index and dimensions from the master array.
